message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $78. I'm trying to stay within my budget
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell it to you for $82.
I really like the product, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'll meet you at $80. Can you sell it to me for that price?
